page.title: 02LAMPLUGH SPORTS COMMITTEE
page.content: The Lamplugh Sports Committee has been arranging the Lamplugh children's sports for forty years. The sports are held on the last Saturday in June. It is free to enter the races, if you win you get medals and cups. There are three age groups, 5 to 7, 8 to 11 and 12 to 15, the events are long sprint short sprint, steeple-chase, throwing the cricket ball and crosscountry. There is a toddlers race and novelty races as well. The Lamplugh Sports Committee don't just arrange the sports they hold dances and a Christmas Raffle to raise money for the sports. They also have a Christmas party for the children of Lamplugh before Christmas and a bonfire with firework display for everybody on the fifth of November.
